channel.title: Need help with bonuses for prayer!
channel.description: Does anyone know how to add bonuses to prayer =P. So far i managed to add level requirements for prayer.. it would help if sum 1 knew.

item.title: Need help with bonuses for prayer!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

look for the method CalculateMaxHit()

and under it there should be something like

		if (Str1) { //Burst Of Strength
			MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.005);
		}

just follow that procedure and you’ll have full prayer and if you don’t then follow that one about and put a public boolean in and put this for your prayer

case 21234: // Burst Of Strength
if(Str1 == false)
{
noprayer();
NewDrain = 40;
DrainPray = true;
Str1 = true;
newdrain();
}
else if(Str1 == true)
{
Str1 = false;
}
break;

im pretty sure the about increases it by 5% in str

hope it helps

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with bonuses for prayer!
